item.title: UltraHD via Satellite to Exceed 785 Channels Over Next Decade
item.description:
UltraHD via Satellite to Exceed 785 Channels Over Next Decade

CAMBRIDGE, MA--(Marketwired - Mar 29, 2016) - Releasing tomorrow, NSR's UltraHD via Satellite, 3rd Edition report identifies 2016 as a key inflection point for the rollout of UltraHD via satellite. NSR forecasts over 785 UltraHD channels by 2025, and satellite capacity required to carry bandwidth intensive UltraHD channels will drive...
